q: Cecile Frot-Coutaz says Idol isn't making the mistake of trying to replace Simon Cowell with a facsimile.`` You can't, and it would be foolish to try to do that,'' she says. If you go,` We're going to find another slightly nasty British( recording) executive,' people would reject that because that person would never live up to what Simon Cowell is. That's a recipe for disaster. In our very humble opinion, the only thing you can do is try to create a panel that's entertaining, likable and credible. Angelina Jolie will jede freie Minute mit ihren Kindern verbringen Die US-Schauspielerin Angelina Jolie , selbst Mutter von sechs Kindern, hat anderen M?ttern dazu geraten, jeden Moment mit dem Nachwuchs zu sch?tzen. Genie?t einfach jede Minute, weil die Zeit die beste im Leben ist und so schnell vergeht , sagte die 35- J?hrige im Interview mit dem australischen Radio-Sender`` 2Day FM''. Simon Cowell admitted he asked former said`` Idol'' judge Paula Abdul to be on`` X Factor,'' which debuts next fall.`` I'm a massive fan of Paula Abdul ,'' he told reporters. We've been in regular contact. I'm not going to say today who we are going to confirm or not, because the truth is we haven't made up our minds up yet.... It comes down to who I think is interesting, and the commitment and the expertise each person offers. Simon Cowell also said overnight sensation Susan Boyle -- who appeared on the British version of`` X Factor''-- taught him a lesson. NEW YORK POST is a registered trademark of NYP Holdings, Inc.
